eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Dolly takes Eyjafjalla to the midnight gathering of the Little Black Sheep, and asks her to retrieve three items lost in Siesta, promising an answer in return. Bison and Swire continue to compete for the rebuilding project.

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Me, me!
I thought you would have gotten used to me now, but then I remembered I haven't ever spoken to you like this before. Or have I? I don't remember.
Like a cloud drifting down from the night sky—
A furry creature appears before Adele, spinning slowly in the air.
It lands on a mailbox by the roadside, looking both graceful and comical.
Oh—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Hello? Good evening?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: ...Little Black Sheep?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You're calling me Little Black Sheep? Sure, I guess.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Why the look of surprise? We've met. I mean, we have, haven't we?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Sorry, I... I didn't know you could talk.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We don't talk often. I mean, I'm the only one who can. The rest of us, well, maybe they don't like interacting with people. Or maybe they haven't learned to yet?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Anyway, that's not important. I've found you now, so I can just talk to you.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: You... you know me?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I guess you could say I watched you grow up?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Now, no, I don't peep at private lives. It's just, well, pure and simple companionship. Anyway, what I mean to say is, of course I know you.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: I don't know if it's a coincidence that I ran into you here, but it's an opportunity.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I don't quite understand.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Of course, puny humans always have so many questions. Don't worry, I'll answer.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Let's have a little chat. Do you have time for that? I'm not sure if girls your age need to be home by a certain time or not.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: I'm not a kid anymore!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Good, then you have time. Want to go for a walk?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Water hole, hot springs, white smoke.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: That's wrong! The smoke from the volcano is gray. Siesta isn't like this.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: But that's not Siesta anymore.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Siesta is where we are right now. Those big tall buildings all have white smoke.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: This is Siesta, but that Siesta is Siesta too.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I know, let's call it Old Siesta!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: This Siesta is the child of Old Siesta.
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Old Siesta is like Dad. It's far away from us right now... but it'll come back, and it'll bring gifts for us!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: What would you want?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Are you off work?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Shh, be quiet, Harley is sleeping.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Do you remember what I told you the last time, kids?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Don't go out at night, don't go to the plates outside the nomadic city...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: And don't draw on anything but drawing paper...
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Now, who's the great artist who painted the portrait of 'Herman Shell-Brain' on the restaurant's back wall?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: But all the grown ups call him that...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Well... grown ups aren't always right. That's why it means something for the three of us to go on adventures. We find treasures that they don't.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Before that, though, we're going to clean the wall tomorrow, right?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Then, for good kids who admit their mistakes—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: The young man extends a hand, three finely made clay dolls with lifelike expressions lying in his palm, just like the smiles in the family photo on the table.
One for each member of our adventure team.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Where did you get this?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I made it. Like I said, I know magic.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You don't like it?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Liberi, Feline, Perro...)
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: (Why are all of them different?)
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I wish I got a 'D32 Steel Warrior' instead.
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Special gifts are for special days. Don't worry, all that you want is waiting in the future.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Now, it's bedtime.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: When can we go back to Old Siesta, Enis?
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Not yet. It gets really grumpy and breathes fire if you wake it up.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Give it time, and maybe it'll be in a better mood. Then we can go and find it together.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I want to be an adventurer like dad!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: We're even better than that. We're an adventure team.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: We're an adventure team! Enis, you should take us to dig up those black rocks!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Listen, you promised not to tell anyone that I went to dig up black rocks. That's a secret, you know.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Will you take us to Old Siesta's beach park?
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: I don't know if there will be much left of it... but I can take you to another amusement park.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: There are water parks elsewhere too. You've seen them in Dad's photos, haven't you?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Volcano AND water park! It's a promise!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Yup, a promise between the members of the adventure team.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Goods from the Columbian partners have been loaded. On the Leithanien side...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: And I have to survey the layout of the trade fair venue...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's getting rather late, Young Master. You should get some rest. You don't have to do everything yourself.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: I can't just sit around doing nothing...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The residents aren't too excited about a logistics hub. Maybe the international trade fair will change their attitude.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: As an independent city state, Siesta has enormous potential in leveraging its position as a transportation hub.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's hard for one in the middle of all this to understand one's place in changes like these. They have their minds full worrying about a new life in which they don't know what to expect.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: I know. I remember how I cried when we moved from Minos when I was little.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Change is always scary. I want to make it easier on everyone.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: I understand you met with Miss Swire today.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: ...I did.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: We couldn't reach a consensus, but the conversation helped remind me...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Messenger or merchant, the power to change lives comes with great responsibility.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Are you sure this responsibility is yours to bear?
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Your father has high hopes for you, but he did not ask you to shoulder such responsibility so early.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: I will never leave his shadow if I only do what he wants me to.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: The Siesta project is important to him. There's never been a better chance to realize the dream he had when he established MountainDash Logistics.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: MountainDash is based in Lungmen, and bound by the rules of the Federation of Enterprises. He faces difficulty when it comes to the Siestan subsidiary.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Your father told me he expects you to be ready to take over his work in five years, and that he has already started planning his retirement in Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Perhaps he should accelerate those plans.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Now you're just teasing me...
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Still, it would be good for Father to spend more time with Mother.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Thanks, Butler. Don't worry about me. I want to get this done while I'm focused.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Enjoying yourself?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I had tons of local food and tried the artificial hot springs here! I guess they have the same effects as real volcanic hot springs. It was so good!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I didn't get to see the legendary Obsidian Festival, but I had a great time taking in the passionate atmosphere!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Very nice. Sounds like New Siesta has a lot of business potential.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Say, did you feel like you were being watched out there?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Watched?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: No need to get anxious, just asking.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I completely understand if that wasn't exactly at the top of your mind.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: A-Are you here in Siesta on a secret mission?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Mission? What mission? Like I said, I'm here on vacation.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I don't deal with the L.G.D. often, but I've heard stories about you, why you joined the L.G.D., and...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: And your family... I can imagine how hard the decision was for you.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I shouldn't have talked to those reporters.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's always the same thing. Getting kidnapped by terrorists when you're little is not exactly something you boast about.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I hear you've basically been in charge of the L.G.D. ever since Superintendent Ch'en left two years ago.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I don't exactly understand why you're here in Siesta now, representing your family as an investor.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: And the people who followed us today were from Lungmen too, weren't they?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Well, you've got me there.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What do you think about Lungmen, Snowsant?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Well... it's my home.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I've seen how it changed from when I left Lungmen to study in Columbia, and in the years since I returned.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: As an engineer, it makes me glad to see one skyscraper rise after another, firm and solid.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Firm and solid, yes... a little too much so.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's hard for new life to get the sun and nutrition it needs when tall skyscrapers block the light.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Forget it. I'm just babbling.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't tell anyone what I just said to you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It seemed a very long walk.
The massive creature plods forward slowly, quietly. Adele follows behind it, rubbing her eyes from time to time.
One step, two steps. Adele walks forward, stepping on her own shadow. The other passersby seem completely oblivious to the massive creature. Is this real, or just a dream?
What are you looking at, girl?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: N-Nothing...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Aren't we going for a walk? To... where exactly?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We're almost there.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Look up.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: One, two, three... a little creature stops and lifts its head in the light of the streetlamps.
Furry creatures leap and roll on the unfinished plate in the pale moonlight.
Four, five, six...
Little bits of wool drift in the air, under the scattered lamp light.
Almost like sparks, falling in this summer night that no one knows about.
Seven, eight, nine...
They leap across the container in orderly file, leaving marks on the metal with their hooves...
A-Are all these Little Black Sheep?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Mr. Little... I mean, Mr. Big Black Sheep...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I?
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: I may be a lot older than you are, but you can call me by my name. It's Dolly.
attributes.name: Strange Creature

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: People in fairy tales always see strange things when they're about to die...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Really? How tasteless! That's the kind of stories parents tell their kids these days?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Don't worry, girl, it's not your time yet.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: How have you been? Ah, maybe not the best question... I can see you're not too well. Not in terms of health, at least.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: But there's nothing that can be done about it... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mutti said that the little sheep around me are a gift from her. Did she ask you to stay by my side?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Did you know my parents?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's a little hard to explain just who these little guys are. Let's call them my clones.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: They all have some special link to this world, and they have different personalities. The fact that they're willing to stay by your side means you're a likeable girl.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: As for your parents, of course I knew them.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I remember that young couple from Leithanien, who wanted to conquer all the volcanoes across the globe.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I have to say that, for humans, trying to achieve something regarding 'everything' in the world is a fool's errand.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: But it's different when it comes to volcanoes. It's a classy dream.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Stubborn, but smart, with a real eye for beauty! Especially your mother. I haven't met many people wiser than her.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Were you by their side when... at the end?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Ah, now that's a topic not to be spoken of lightly...
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: It was very much a surprise. No one knew the volcano would erupt there and then. But could puny humans really come to know everything about the globe?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Do you feel any sadness about it?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Thank goodness you aren't asking me why I didn't save them.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I love volcanoes, of course. Surfing on molten lava is the second best thing on the planet.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: But volcanoes took the lives of two of my friends. It's the eleventh worst thing to happen in recent years.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: We all want to prevent bad things from happening, but I'm not as omnipotent as I look. There are many things I can't do.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: If you're really sad, though, you can rub yourself against my wool. That often helps when you're feeling down.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Anyway.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: The past isn't truly over. They're always by your side, in one way or another.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Human and beast sit by the seashore, feeling the caress of the warm sea breeze, and listening to the soft clashing of the waves.
The furry pack of beasts quietly play their game, leaping back and forth on containers and scaffolds, humming contentedly from time to time.
One little beast tries to climb the container, following the herd in front, but fails repeatedly.
(Wistful moan)
attributes.name: Tiny Creature

attributes.content: Sorry, it's been so long since I've sat down for a chat with a human. My vocabulary is limited, so I'll dispense with the formalities.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Rather than ask questions that have obvious answers, what I want to ask is—are you happy, little one?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I... I'm trying to finish my parents' research. It's hard work, but it feels meaningful.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: So you're not happy.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: We met in Siesta, as fate would have it. Let's make a deal.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Wait, is that the right word in your language? 'Deal?' Maybe I should use a more friendly word... let's say, 'game.'
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Anyway, I want you to find a few things for me that I lost in Siesta. Consider it a treasure hunt.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: What is it that you lost?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Let me think. The North Wind, a seed, and a fur.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: What... do you mean by those?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Where's the fun in a game if you know the solution beforehand? Don't be too eager to seek an answer. Feel it out.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: It'll be worth your while, I promise. I'll have something for you when you find all three.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Hm... how about that which you have been seeking?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: What I've been seeking?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.text: 'I just can't accept the mysterious circumstances surrounding their deaths.'

attributes.content: North Wind, seed, fur. Good hunting!
attributes.name: Dolly
